ayahs.translation: that very Day shall be a day of anguish,

ayahs.text: عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍۢ
ayahs.translation: not of ease, for all who [now] deny the truth!

ayahs.text: ذَرْنِى وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًۭا
ayahs.translation: LEAVE Me alone [to deal] with him whom I have created alone,

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُۥ مَالًۭا مَّمْدُودًۭا
ayahs.translation: and to whom I have granted resources vast,

ayahs.text: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًۭا
ayahs.translation: and children as [love's] witnesses,

ayahs.text: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمْهِيدًۭا
ayahs.translation: and to whose life I gave so wide a scope:

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
ayahs.translation: and yet, he greedily desires that I give yet more!

ayahs.text: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِءَايَٰتِنَا عَنِيدًۭا
ayahs.translation: Nay, verily, it is against Our messages that he knowingly, stubbornly sets himself

ayahs.text: سَأُرْهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا
ayahs.translation: [and so] I shall constrain him to endure a painful uphill climb!

ayahs.text: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
ayahs.translation: Behold, [when Our messages are conveyed to one who is bent on denying the truth,] he reflects and meditates [as to how to disprove them] –

ayahs.text: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
ayahs.translation: and thus he destroys himself, the way he meditates:

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
ayahs.translation: yea, he destroys himself, the way he meditates!

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
ayahs.translation: and then he looks [around for new arguments],

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
ayahs.translation: and then he frowns and glares,

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَٱسْتَكْبَرَ
ayahs.translation: and in the end he turns his back [on Our message], and glories in his arrogance,

ayahs.text: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌۭ يُؤْثَرُ
ayahs.translation: and says, "All this is mere spellbinding eloquence handed down [from olden times]!

ayahs.text: إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوْلُ ٱلْبَشَرِ
ayahs.translation: This is nothing but the word of mortal man!"

ayahs.text: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
ayahs.translation: [Hence,] I shall cause him to endure hell-fire [in the life to come]!

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what hell-fire is?

ayahs.text: لَا تُبْقِى وَلَا تَذَرُ
ayahs.translation: It does not allow to live, and neither leaves [to die],

ayahs.text: لَوَّاحَةٌۭ لِّلْبَشَرِ
ayahs.translation: making [all truth] visible to mortal man.

ayahs.text: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
ayahs.translation: Over it are nineteen [powers].

ayahs.text: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَٰٓئِكَةًۭ ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةًۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَٰنًۭا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ وَٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًۭا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
ayahs.translation: For We have caused none but angelic powers to lord over the fire [of hell]; and We have not caused their number to be aught but a trial for those who are bent on denying the truth - to the end that they who have been granted revelation aforetime might be convinced [of the truth of this divine writ]; and that they who have attained to faith [in it] might grow yet more firm in their faith; and that [both] they who have been granted the earlier revelation and they who believe [in this one] might be freed of all doubt; and that they in whose hearts is disease and the who deny the truth outright might ask, "What does [your] God mean by this parable?" In this way God lets go astray him that wills [to go astray], and guides aright him that wills [to be guided]. And none can comprehend thy Sustainers forces save Him alone: and all this is but a reminder to mortal man.

ayahs.text: كَلَّا وَٱلْقَمَرِ
ayahs.translation: NAY, but consider the moon!

ayahs.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
ayahs.translation: Consider the night when it departs,

ayahs.text: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَآ أَسْفَرَ
ayahs.translation: and the morn when it dawns!

ayahs.text: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى ٱلْكُبَرِ
ayahs.translation: Verily, that [hell-fire) is Indeed one of the great [forewarnings] –

ayahs.text: نَذِيرًۭا لِّلْبَشَرِ
ayahs.translation: a warning to mortal man –

ayahs.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
ayahs.translation: to everyone of you, whether he chooses to come forward or to hang back!

ayahs.text: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
ayahs.translation: [On the Day of Judgment,] every human being will be held in pledge for whatever [evil] he has wrought –

ayahs.text: إِلَّآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلْيَمِينِ
ayahs.translation: save those who shall have attained to righteousness:

ayahs.text: فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: [dwelling] In gardens [of paradise], they will inquire

ayahs.text: عَنِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: of those who were lost in sin:

ayahs.text: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِى سَقَرَ
ayahs.translation: "What has brought you into hell-fire?"

ayahs.text: قَالُوا۟ لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ
ayahs.translation: They will answer: "We were not among those who prayed;

ayahs.text: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ ٱلْمِسْكِينَ
ayahs.translation: and neither did we feed the needy;

ayahs.text: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلْخَآئِضِينَ
ayahs.translation: and we were wont to indulge in sinning together with all [the others] who indulged in it;

ayahs.text: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: and the Day of Judgment we were wont to call a lie –

ayahs.text: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلْيَقِينُ
ayahs.translation: until certainty came upon us [in death]."

ayahs.text: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَٰعَةُ ٱلشَّٰفِعِينَ
ayahs.translation: And so, of no benefit to them could be the intercession of any that would intercede for them.

ayahs.text: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ ٱلتَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
ayahs.translation: WHAT, THEN, is amiss with them that they turn away from all admonition

ayahs.text: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌۭ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: as though they were terrified asses

ayahs.text: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍۭ
ayahs.translation: fleeing from a lion?

ayahs.text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًۭا مُّنَشَّرَةًۭ
ayahs.translation: Yea, everyone of them claims that he [himself] ought to have been given revelations unfolded!

ayahs.text: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ
ayahs.translation: Nay, but they do not [believe in and, hence, do not] fear the life to come.

ayahs.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Nay, verily, this is an admonition –

ayahs.text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: and whoever wills may take it to heart.

ayahs.text: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ
ayahs.translation: But they [who do not believe in the life to come] will not take it to heart unless God so wills: [for] He is the Fount of all God-consciousness, and the Fount of all forgiveness.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ
ayahs.translation: NAY! I call to witness the Day of Resurrection!

ayahs.text: وَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلنَّفْسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
ayahs.translation: But nay! I call to witness the accusing voice of man's own conscience!

ayahs.text: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: Does man think that We cannot [resurrect him and] bring his bones together again?

ayahs.text: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: Yea indeed, We are able to make whole his very finger-tips!

ayahs.text: بَلْ يُرِيدُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: None the less man chooses to deny what lies ahead of him,

ayahs.text: يَسْـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ
ayahs.translation: asking [derisively], "When is that Resurrection Day to be?"

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلْبَصَرُ
ayahs.translation: But [on that Day,] when the eyesight is by fear confounded,

ayahs.text: وَخَسَفَ ٱلْقَمَرُ
ayahs.translation: and the moon is darkened,

ayahs.text: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ
ayahs.translation: and the sun and the moon are brought together

ayahs.text: يَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ ٱلْمَفَرُّ
ayahs.translation: on that Day will man exclaim "Whither to flee?"

ayahs.text: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
ayahs.translation: But nay: no refuge [for thee, O man]!

ayahs.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمُسْتَقَرُّ
ayahs.translation: With thy Sustainer, on that Day, the journey's end will be!

ayahs.text: يُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
ayahs.translation: Man will be apprised, on that Day, of what he has done and what he has left undone:

ayahs.text: بَلِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: nay, but man shall against himself be an eye-witness,

ayahs.text: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: even though he may veil himself in excuses.

ayahs.text: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
ayahs.translation: MOVE NOT thy tongue in haste, [repeating the words of the revelation:]

ayahs.text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُۥ وَقُرْءَانَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: for, behold, it is for Us to gather it [in thy heart,] and to cause it to be read [as it ought to be read].

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعْ قُرْءَانَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: Thus, when We recite it, follow thou its wording [with all thy mind]:

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: and then, behold, it will be for Us to make its meaning clear.

ayahs.text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ
ayahs.translation: NAY, but [most of] you love this fleeting life,

ayahs.text: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ
ayahs.translation: and give no thought to the life to come [and to Judgment Day]!

ayahs.text: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ نَّاضِرَةٌ
ayahs.translation: Some faces will on that Day be bright with happiness,

ayahs.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: looking up to their Sustainer;

ayahs.text: وَوُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بَاسِرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: and some faces will on that Day be overcast with despair,

ayahs.text: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: knowing that a crushing calamity is about to befall them.

ayahs.text: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِىَ
ayahs.translation: NAY, but when [the last breath] comes up to the throat [of a dying man],

ayahs.text: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍۢ
ayahs.translation: and people ask, "Is there any wizard [that could save him]?"

ayahs.text: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلْفِرَاقُ
ayahs.translation: the while he [himself] knows that this is the parting,

ayahs.text: وَٱلْتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
ayahs.translation: and is enwrapped in the pangs of death

ayahs.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمَسَاقُ
ayahs.translation: at that time towards thy Sustainer does he feel impelled to turn!

ayahs.text: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: [Useless, though, will be his repentance: for [as long as he was alive] he did not accept the truth, nor did he pray [for enlightenment],

ayahs.text: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: but, on the contrary, he gave the lie to the truth and turned away [from it],

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: and then went arrogantly back to what he had come from.

ayahs.text: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
ayahs.translation: [And yet, O man, thine end comes hourly] nearer unto thee, and nearer –

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: and ever nearer unto thee, and nearer!

ayahs.text: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
ayahs.translation: DOES MAN, then, think that he is to be left to himself to go about at will?

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةًۭ مِّن مَّنِىٍّۢ يُمْنَىٰ
ayahs.translation: Was he not once a [mere] drop of sperm that had been spilt,

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةًۭ فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: and thereafter became a germ-cell - whereupon He created and formed [it] in accordance with what [it] was meant to be,

ayahs.text: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: and fashioned out of it the two sexes, the male and the female?

ayahs.text: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْۦِىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ
ayahs.translation: Is not He, then; able to bring the dead back to life?

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَٰنِ حِينٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًۭٔا مَّذْكُورًا
ayahs.translation: HAS THERE [not] been an endless span of time before man [appeared - a time] when he was not yet a thing to be thought of?

ayahs.text: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍۢ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
ayahs.translation: Verily, it is We who have created man out of a drop of sperm intermingled, so that We might try him [in his later life]: and therefore We made him a being endowed with hearing and sight.

ayahs.text: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًۭا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
ayahs.translation: Verily, We have shown him the way: [and it rests with him to prove himself] either grateful or ungrateful.

ayahs.text: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَٰلًۭا وَسَعِيرًا
ayahs.translation: [Now,] behold, for those who deny the truth We have readied chains and shackles, and a blazing flame

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍۢ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
ayahs.translation: [whereas,] behold, the truly virtuous shall drink from a cup flavoured with the calyx of sweet-smelling flowers:

ayahs.text: عَيْنًۭا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًۭا
ayahs.translation: a source [of bliss] whereof God's servants shall drink, seeing it flow in a flow abundant.

ayahs.text: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًۭا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًۭا
ayahs.translation: [The truly virtuous are] they [who] fulfil their vows, and stand in awe of a Day the woe of which is bound to spread far and wide,

ayahs.text: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًۭا وَيَتِيمًۭا وَأَسِيرًا
ayahs.translation: and who give food - however great be their own want of it - unto the needy, and the orphan, and the captive,

ayahs.text: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَلَا شُكُورًا
ayahs.translation: [saying, in their hearts,] "We feed you for the sake of God alone: we desire no recompense from you, nor thanks:

ayahs.text: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًۭا قَمْطَرِيرًۭا
ayahs.translation: behold, we stand in awe of our Sustainer's judgment on a distressful, fateful Day!"

ayahs.text: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةًۭ وَسُرُورًۭا
ayahs.translation: And so, God will preserve them from the woes of that Day, and will bestow on them brightness and joy,

ayahs.text: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةًۭ وَحَرِيرًۭا
ayahs.translation: and will reward them for all their patience in adversity with a garden [of bliss] and with [garments of] silk.

ayahs.text: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًۭا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًۭا
ayahs.translation: In that [garden] they will on couches recline, and will know therein neither [burning] sun nor cold severe,

ayahs.text: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًۭا
ayahs.translation: since its [blissful] shades will come down low over them, and low will hang down its clusters of fruit, most easy to reach.

ayahs.text: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍۢ مِّن فِضَّةٍۢ وَأَكْوَابٍۢ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
ayahs.translation: And they will be waited upon with vessels of silver and goblets that will [seem to] be crystal –

ayahs.text: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍۢ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًۭا
ayahs.translation: crystal-like, [but] of silver - the measure whereof they alone will determine.

ayahs.text: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًۭا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
ayahs.translation: And in that [paradise] they will be given to drink of a cup flavoured with ginger,

ayahs.text: عَيْنًۭا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًۭا
ayahs.translation: [derived from] a source [to be found] therein, whose name is "Seek Thy Way".

ayahs.text: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌۭ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًۭا مَّنثُورًۭا
ayahs.translation: And immortal youths will wait upon them: when thou seest them, thou wouldst deem them to be scattered pearls;

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًۭا وَمُلْكًۭا كَبِيرًا
ayahs.translation: and when thou seest [anything that is] there thou wilt see [only] bliss and a realm transcendent

ayahs.text: عَٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌۭ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌۭ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍۢ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًۭا طَهُورًا
ayahs.translation: Upon those [blest] will be garments of green silk and brocade; and they will be adorned with bracelets of silver. And their Sustainer will them to drink of a drink most pure.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
ayahs.translation: [And they will be told:] "Verily, all this is your reward since Your endeavour [in life] has met [God's] goodly acceptance!"

ayahs.text: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًۭا
ayahs.translation: VERILY, [O believer,] it is We who have bestowed from on high this Qur’an upon thee, step by step - truly a bestowal from on high!

ayahs.text: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًۭا
ayahs.translation: Await, then, in all patience thy Sustainer's judgment, and pay no heed to any of them, who is a wilful sinner or an ingrate;

ayahs.text: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةًۭ وَأَصِيلًۭا
ayahs.translation: and bear in mind thy Sustainer's name at morn and evening

ayahs.text: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًۭا طَوِيلًا
ayahs.translation: and during some of the night, and prostrate thyself before Him, and extol His limitless glory throughout the long night.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًۭا ثَقِيلًۭا
ayahs.translation: Behold, they [who are unmindful of God] love this fleeting life, and leave behind them [all thought of] a grief-laden Day.

ayahs.text: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
ayahs.translation: [They will not admit to themselves that] it We who have created them and strengthened their make - and [that] if it be Our will We can replace them entirely with others of their kind.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًۭا
ayahs.translation: VERILY, all this is an admonition: whoever, then, so wills, may unto his Sustainer find a way.

ayahs.text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا
ayahs.translation: But you cannot will it unless God wills [to show you that way]: for, behold, God is indeed all-seeing, wise.

ayahs.text: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
ayahs.translation: He admits unto His grace everyone who wills [to be admitted]; but as for the evildoers - for them has He readied grievous suffering [in the life to come].

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلْمُرْسَلَٰتِ عُرْفًۭا
ayahs.translation: CONSIDER these [messages,] sent forth in waves

ayahs.text: فَٱلْعَٰصِفَٰتِ عَصْفًۭا
ayahs.translation: and then storming on with a tempest's force!

ayahs.text: وَٱلنَّٰشِرَٰتِ نَشْرًۭا
ayahs.translation: Consider these [messages] that spread [the truth] far and wide,

ayahs.text: فَٱلْفَٰرِقَٰتِ فَرْقًۭا
ayahs.translation: thus separating [right and wrong] with all clarity,

ayahs.text: فَٱلْمُلْقِيَٰتِ ذِكْرًا
ayahs.translation: and then giving forth a reminder,

ayahs.text: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
ayahs.translation: [promising] freedom from blame or [offering] a warning!

ayahs.text: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٌۭ
ayahs.translation: BEHOLD, all that you are told to expect will surely come to pass.

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
ayahs.translation: Thus, [it will come to pass] when the stars are effaced,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the sky is rent asunder,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the mountains are scattered like dust,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when all the apostles are called together at a time appointed...

ayahs.text: لِأَىِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
ayahs.translation: For what day has the term [of all this] been set?

ayahs.text: لِيَوْمِ ٱلْفَصْلِ
ayahs.translation: For the Day of Distinction [between the true and the false]!

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that Day of Distinction will be?

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.translation: Did We not destroy [so many of] those [sinners] of olden days?

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ
ayahs.translation: And We shall let them be followed by those of later times:

ayahs.text: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: [for] thus do We deal with such as are lost in sin.

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍۢ مَّهِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Did We not create you out of a humble fluid

ayahs.text: فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ فِى قَرَارٍۢ مَّكِينٍ
ayahs.translation: which We then let remain in [the womb's] firm keeping

ayahs.text: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ
ayahs.translation: for a term pre-ordained?

ayahs.text: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْقَٰدِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: Thus have We determined [the nature of man's creation]: and excellent indeed is Our power to determine [what is to be]!

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: Woe, on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
ayahs.translation: Have We not caused the earth to hold within itself

ayahs.text: أَحْيَآءًۭ وَأَمْوَٰتًۭا
ayahs.translation: the living and the dead?

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَٰمِخَٰتٍۢ وَأَسْقَيْنَٰكُم مَّآءًۭ فُرَاتًۭا
ayahs.translation: and have We not set on it proud, firm mountains, and given you sweet water to drink?

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

ayahs.text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayahs.translation: GO ON towards that [resurrection] which you were wont to call a lie!

ayahs.text: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّۢ ذِى ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Go on towards the threefold shadow

ayahs.text: لَّا ظَلِيلٍۢ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
ayahs.translation: that will offer no [cooling] shade and will be of no avail against the flame

ayahs.text: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِى بِشَرَرٍۢ كَٱلْقَصْرِ
ayahs.translation: which – behold!- will throw up sparks like [burning] logs,

ayahs.text: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَٰلَتٌۭ صُفْرٌۭ
ayahs.translation: like giant fiery ropes!

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth –

ayahs.text: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
ayahs.translation: that Day on which they will not [be able to] utter a word,

ayahs.text: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: nor be allowed to proffer excuses!

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth –

ayahs.text: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَٰكُمْ وَٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.translation: that Day of Distinction [between the true and the false, when they will be told]: "We have brought you together with those [sinners] of olden times;

ayahs.text: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌۭ فَكِيدُونِ
ayahs.translation: and if you [think that you] have a subterfuge left, try to outwit Me!"

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَٰلٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ
ayahs.translation: [AS AGAINST this,] behold, the God-conscious shall dwell amidst [cooling] shades and springs,

ayahs.text: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
ayahs.translation: and [partake of] whatever fruit they may desire;

ayahs.text: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: [and they will be told:] "Eat and drink in good cheer in return for what you did [in life]!"

ayahs.text: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayahs.translation: Thus, behold, do We reward the doers of good;

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: [but] woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth!

ayahs.text: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
ayahs.translation: EAT [your fill] and enjoy your life for a little while, O you who are lost in sin!

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: [But] woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
ayahs.translation: and when they are told, "Bow down [before God]", do not bow down:

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: woe on that Day unto those who give the to the truth!

ayahs.text: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayahs.translation: In what other tiding, then, will they, after this, believe?

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: ABOUT WHAT do they [most often] ask one another?

ayahs.text: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayahs.translation: About the awesome tiding [of resurrection],

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
ayahs.translation: on which they [so utterly] disagree.

ayahs.text: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: Nay, but in time they will come to understand [it]!

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: And once again: Nay, but in time they will come to understand!

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِهَٰدًۭا
ayahs.translation: HAVE WE NOT made the earth a resting-place [for you],

ayahs.text: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًۭا
ayahs.translation: and the mountains [its] pegs?

ayahs.text: وَخَلَقْنَٰكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًۭا
ayahs.translation: And We have created you in pairs;

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًۭا
ayahs.translation: and We have made your sleep [a symbol of] death

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًۭا
ayahs.translation: and made the night [its] cloak

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًۭا
ayahs.translation: and made the day [a symbol of] life.

ayahs.text: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًۭا شِدَادًۭا
ayahs.translation: And We have built above you seven firmaments,

ayahs.text: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًۭا وَهَّاجًۭا
ayahs.translation: and have placed [therein the sun,] a lamp full of blazing splendour.

ayahs.text: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَٰتِ مَآءًۭ ثَجَّاجًۭا
ayahs.translation: And from the wind-driven clouds We send down waters pouring in abundance,

ayahs.text: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبًّۭا وَنَبَاتًۭا
ayahs.translation: so that We might bring forth thereby grain, and herbs,

ayahs.text: وَجَنَّٰتٍ أَلْفَافًا
ayahs.translation: and gardens dense with follage.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَٰتًۭا
ayahs.translation: VERILY, the Day of Distinction [between the true and the false] has indeed its appointed time:

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًۭا
ayahs.translation: the Day when the trumpet [of resurrection] is sounded and you all come forward in multitudes;

ayahs.text: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَٰبًۭا
ayahs.translation: and when the skies are opened and become [as wide-flung] gates;

ayahs.text: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
ayahs.translation: and when the mountains are made to vanish as if they had been a mirage.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًۭا
ayahs.translation: [On that Day,] verily, hell will lie in wait [for those who deny the truth] –

ayahs.text: لِّلطَّٰغِينَ مَـَٔابًۭا
ayahs.translation: a goal for all who are wont to transgress the bounds of what is right!

ayahs.text: لَّٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحْقَابًۭا
ayahs.translation: In it shall they remain for a long time.

ayahs.text: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًۭا وَلَا شَرَابًا
ayahs.translation: Neither coolness shall they taste therein nor any [thirst-quenching] drink –

ayahs.text: إِلَّا حَمِيمًۭا وَغَسَّاقًۭا
ayahs.translation: only burning despair and ice-cold darkness:

ayahs.text: جَزَآءًۭ وِفَاقًا
ayahs.translation: a meet requital [for their sins]!

ayahs.text: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًۭا
ayahs.translation: Behold, they were not expecting to be called to account,

ayahs.text: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كِذَّابًۭا
ayahs.translation: having given the lie to Our messages one and all:

ayahs.text: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَٰهُ كِتَٰبًۭا
ayahs.translation: but We have placed on record every single thing [of what they did].

ayahs.text: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
ayahs.translation: [And so We shall say:] "Taste, then, [the fruit of your evil doings,] for now We shall bestow on you nothing but more and more suffering!"

ayahs.text: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
ayahs.translation: [But,] verily for the God-conscious there is supreme fulfilment in store:

ayahs.text: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعْنَٰبًۭا
ayahs.translation: luxuriant gardens and vinyards,

ayahs.text: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًۭا
ayahs.translation: and splendid companions well matched,

ayahs.text: وَكَأْسًۭا دِهَاقًۭا
ayahs.translation: and a cup [of happiness] overflowing.

ayahs.text: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًۭا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًۭا
ayahs.translation: No empty talk will they hear in that [paradise], nor any lie.

ayahs.text: جَزَآءًۭ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابًۭا
ayahs.translation: [All this will be] a reward from thy Sustainer, a gift in accordance with [His Own] reckoning –

ayahs.text: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًۭا
ayahs.translation: [a reward from] the Sustainer of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, the Most Gracious! [And] none shall have it in their power to raise their voices unto Him

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّۭا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًۭا
ayahs.translation: on the Day when all [human] souls and all the angels will stand up in ranks: none will speak but he to whom the Most Gracious will have given leave; and [everyone] will say [only] what is right.

ayahs.text: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
ayahs.translation: That will be the Day of Ultimate Truth: whoever wills, then, let him take the path that leads towards his Sustainer!

ayahs.text: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَٰكُمْ عَذَابًۭا قَرِيبًۭا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا
ayahs.translation: Verily, We have warned you of suffering near at hand - [suffering] on the Day when man shall [clearly] see what his hands have sent ahead, and when he who has denied the truth shall say, "Oh, would that I were mere dust...!"

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلنَّٰزِعَٰتِ غَرْقًۭا
ayahs.translation: CONSIDER those [stars] that rise only to set,

ayahs.text: وَٱلنَّٰشِطَٰتِ نَشْطًۭا
ayahs.translation: and move [in their orbits] with steady motion,

ayahs.text: وَٱلسَّٰبِحَٰتِ سَبْحًۭا
ayahs.translation: and float [through space] with floating serene,

ayahs.text: فَٱلسَّٰبِقَٰتِ سَبْقًۭا
ayahs.translation: and yet overtake [one another] with swift overtaking:

ayahs.text: فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمْرًۭا
ayahs.translation: and thus they fulfil the [Creator's] behest!

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
ayahs.translation: [HENCE, think of] the Day when a violent convulsion will convulse [the world],

ayahs.text: تَتْبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
ayahs.translation: to be followed by further [convulsions]!

ayahs.text: قُلُوبٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ وَاجِفَةٌ
ayahs.translation: On that Day will [men's] hearts be throbbing,

ayahs.text: أَبْصَٰرُهَا خَٰشِعَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: [and] their eyes downcast...

ayahs.text: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِى ٱلْحَافِرَةِ
ayahs.translation: [And yet,] some say, "What! Are we indeed to be restored to our former state –

ayahs.text: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمًۭا نَّخِرَةًۭ
ayahs.translation: even though we may have become [a heap of] crumbling bones?"

ayahs.text: قَالُوا۟ تِلْكَ إِذًۭا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: [And] they add, "That, then, would be a return with loss!"

ayahs.text: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: [But,] then, that [Last Hour] will be [upon them of a sudden, as if it were] but a single accusing cry -

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
ayahs.translation: and then, lo, they will be fully awakened [to the truth]!

ayahs.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: HAS THE STORY of Moses ever come within thy ken.

ayahs.text: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
ayahs.translation: Lo! His Sustainer called out to him in the twice-hallowed valley:

ayahs.text: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
ayahs.translation: "Go unto Pharaoh - for, verily, he has transgressed all bounds of what is right -

ayahs.text: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: and say [unto him], 'Art thou desirous of attaining to purity?

ayahs.text: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
ayahs.translation: [If so,] then I shall guide thee towards [a cognition of] thy Sustainer, so that [henceforth] thou wilt stand in awe [of Him].’"

ayahs.text: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلْءَايَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: And thereupon he [went to Pharaoh and] made him aware of the great wonder [of God's grace].

ayahs.text: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
ayahs.translation: But [Pharaoh] gave him the lie and rebelliously rejected [all guidance],

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and brusquely turned his back [on Moses];

ayahs.text: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and then he gathered [his great ones], and called [unto his people],

ayahs.text: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and said, "I am your Lord All-Highest!"

ayahs.text: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: And thereupon God took him to task, [and made him] a warning example in the life to come as well as in this world.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةًۭ لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: In this, behold, there is a lesson indeed for all who stand in awe [of God].

ayahs.text: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ ۚ بَنَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: [O MEN!] Are you more difficult to create than the heaven which He has built?

ayahs.text: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: High has He reared its vault and formed it in accordance with what it was meant to be;

ayahs.text: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: and He has made dark its night and brought forth its light of day.

ayahs.text: وَٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ
ayahs.translation: And after that, the earth: wide has He spread its expanse,

ayahs.text: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرْعَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: and has caused its waters to come out of it, and its pastures,

ayahs.text: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: and has made the mountains firm:

ayahs.text: مَتَٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ
ayahs.translation: [all this] as a means of livelihood for you and your animals.

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: AND SO, when the great overwhelming event [of, resurrection] comes to pass –

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
ayahs.translation: on that Day man will [clearly] remember all that he has ever wrought;

ayahs.text: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and the blazing fire [of hell] will be lad open before all who [are destined to] see it.

ayahs.text: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
ayahs.translation: For, unto him who shall have transgressed the bounds of what is right,

ayahs.text: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
ayahs.translation: and preferred the life of this world [to the good of his soul],

ayahs.text: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
ayahs.translation: that blazing fire will truly be the goal!

ayahs.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ
ayahs.translation: But unto him who shall have stood in fear of his Sustainer's Presence, and held back his inner self from base desires,

ayahs.text: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَنَّةَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ
ayahs.translation: paradise will truly be the goal!

ayahs.text: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: THEY WILL ASK thee [O Prophet] about the Last Hour: "When will it come to pass?"

ayahs.text: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَىٰهَآ
ayahs.translation: [But] how couldst thou tell anything about it,

ayahs.text: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ
ayahs.translation: [seeing that] with thy Sustainer alone rests the beginning and the end [of all knowledge] thereof?

ayahs.text: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: Thou art but [sent] to warn those who stand in awe of it.

ayahs.text: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: On the Day when they behold it, [it will seem to them] as if they had tarried [in this world] no longer than one evening or [one night, ending with] its morn!

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: HE FROWNED and turned away

ayahs.text: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ
ayahs.translation: because the blind man approached him!

ayahs.text: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: Yet for all thou didst know, [O Muhammad,] he might perhaps have grown in purity,

ayahs.text: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: or have been reminded [of the truth], and helped by this reminder.

ayahs.text: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
ayahs.translation: Now as for him who believes himself to be self-sufficient

ayahs.text: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: to him didst thou give thy whole attention,

ayahs.text: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: although thou art not accountable for his failure to attain to purity;

ayahs.text: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
ayahs.translation: but as for him who came unto thee full of eagerness

ayahs.text: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and in awe [of God]

ayahs.text: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: him didst thou disregard!

ayahs.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: NAY, VERILY, these [messages] are but a reminder:

ayahs.text: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: and so, whoever is willing may remember Him

ayahs.text: فِى صُحُفٍۢ مُّكَرَّمَةٍۢ
ayahs.translation: in [the light of His] revelations blest with dignity,

ayahs.text: مَّرْفُوعَةٍۢ مُّطَهَّرَةٍۭ
ayahs.translation: lofty and pure,

ayahs.text: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍۢ
ayahs.translation: [borne] by the hands of messengers

ayahs.text: كِرَامٍۭ بَرَرَةٍۢ
ayahs.translation: noble and most virtuous.

ayahs.text: قُتِلَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكْفَرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: [But only too often] man destroys himself: how stubbornly does he deny the truth!

ayahs.text: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: [Does man ever consider] out of what substance [God] creates him?

ayahs.text: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: Out of a drop of sperm He creates him, and thereupon determines his nature,

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: and then makes it easy for him to go through life;

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقْبَرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: and in the end He causes him to die and brings him to the grave;

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: and then, if it be His will, He shall raise him again to life,

ayahs.text: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: Nay, but [man] has never yet fulfilled what He has enjoined upon him!

ayahs.text: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ
ayahs.translation: Let man, then, consider [the sources of] his food:

ayahs.text: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا ٱلْمَآءَ صَبًّۭا
ayahs.translation: [how it is] that We pour down water, pouring it down abundantly;

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ شَقًّۭا
ayahs.translation: and then We cleave the earth [with new growth], cleaving it asunder,

ayahs.text: فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّۭا
ayahs.translation: and thereupon We cause grain to grow out of it,

ayahs.text: وَعِنَبًۭا وَقَضْبًۭا
ayahs.translation: and vines and edible plants,

ayahs.text: وَزَيْتُونًۭا وَنَخْلًۭا
ayahs.translation: and olive trees and date-palms,

ayahs.text: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلْبًۭا
ayahs.translation: and gardens dense with foliage,

ayahs.text: وَفَٰكِهَةًۭ وَأَبًّۭا
ayahs.translation: and fruits and herbage,

ayahs.text: مَّتَٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ
ayahs.translation: for you and for your animals to enjoy.

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ
ayahs.translation: AND SO, when the piercing call [of resurrection] is heard

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
ayahs.translation: on a Day when everyone will [want to] flee from his brother,

ayahs.text: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ
ayahs.translation: and from his mother and father,

ayahs.text: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ
ayahs.translation: and from his spouse and his children:

ayahs.text: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ شَأْنٌۭ يُغْنِيهِ
ayahs.translation: on that Day, to every one of them will his own state be of sufficient concern.

ayahs.text: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ مُّسْفِرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Some faces will on that Day be bright with happiness,

ayahs.text: ضَاحِكَةٌۭ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: laughing, rejoicing at glad tidings.

ayahs.text: وَوُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And some faces will on that Day with dust be covered,

ayahs.text: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
ayahs.translation: with darkness overspread:

ayahs.text: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَفَرَةُ ٱلْفَجَرَةُ
ayahs.translation: these, these will be the ones who denied the truth and were immersed in iniquity!

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
ayahs.translation: WHEN THE SUN is shrouded in darkness,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the stars lose their light,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the mountains are made to vanish,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when she-camels big with young, about to give birth, are left untended,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when all beasts are gathered together,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the seas boil over,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when all human beings are coupled [with their deeds],

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the girl-child that was buried alive is made to ask

ayahs.text: بِأَىِّ ذَنۢبٍۢ قُتِلَتْ
ayahs.translation: for what crime she had been slain,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the scrolls [of men's deeds] are unfolded,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when heaven is laid bare,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the blazing fire [of hell] is kindled bright,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when paradise is brought into view:

ayahs.text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّآ أَحْضَرَتْ
ayahs.translation: [on that Day] every human being will come to know what he has prepared [for himself].

ayahs.text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلْخُنَّسِ
ayahs.translation: BUT NAY! I call to witness the revolving stars,

ayahs.text: ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْكُنَّسِ
ayahs.translation: the planets that run their course and set,

ayahs.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
ayahs.translation: and the night as it darkly falls,

ayahs.text: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
ayahs.translation: and the morn as it softly breathes:

ayahs.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍۢ كَرِيمٍۢ
ayahs.translation: behold, this [divine writ] is indeed the [inspired] word of a noble apostle,

ayahs.text: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: with strength endowed, secure with Him who in almightiness is enthroned

ayahs.text: مُّطَاعٍۢ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: [the word] of one to be heeded, and worthy of trust!

ayahs.text: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍۢ
ayahs.translation: For, this fellow-man of yours is not a madman:

ayahs.text: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
ayahs.translation: he truly beheld [the angel - beheld] him on the clear horizon;

ayahs.text: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: and he is not one to begrudge others the knowledge [of whatever has been revealed to him] out of that which is beyond the reach of human Perception.

ayahs.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَٰنٍۢ رَّجِيمٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Nor is this [message] the word of any satanic force accursed.

ayahs.text: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
ayahs.translation: Whither, then, will you go?

ayahs.text: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.translation: This [message] is no less than a reminder to all mankind –

ayahs.text: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
ayahs.translation: to everyone of you who wills to walk a straight way.

ayahs.text: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.translation: But you cannot will it unless God, the Sustainer of all the worlds, wills [to show you that way].

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ
ayahs.translation: WHEN THE SKY is cleft asunder,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the stars are scattered,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the seas burst beyond their bounds,

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the graves are overturned –

ayahs.text: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
ayahs.translation: every human being will [at last] comprehend, what he has sent ahead and what he has held back [in this world].

ayahs.text: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ
ayahs.translation: O MAN! What is it that lures thee away from thy bountiful Sustainer,

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
ayahs.translation: who has created thee, and formed thee in accordance with what thou art meant' to be, and shaped thy nature in just proportions,

ayahs.text: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍۢ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ
ayahs.translation: having put thee together in whatever form He willed [thee to have]?

ayahs.text: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: Nay, [O men,] but you [are lured away from God whenever you are tempted to] give the lie to [God’s] Judgment!

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَٰفِظِينَ
ayahs.translation: And yet, verily, there are ever-watchful forces over you,

ayahs.text: كِرَامًۭا كَٰتِبِينَ
ayahs.translation: noble, recording,

ayahs.text: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: aware of whatever you do!

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Behold, [in the life to come] the truly virtuous: will indeed be in bliss,

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّ ٱلْفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَحِيمٍۢ
ayahs.translation: whereas, behold, the wicked will indeed be in a blazing fire –

ayahs.text: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: [a fire] which they shall enter on Judgment Day,

ayahs.text: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ
ayahs.translation: and which they shall not [be able to] evade.

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that Judgment Day will be?

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: And once again: What could make thee conceive what that Judgment Day will be?

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌۭ لِّنَفْسٍۢ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلَّهِ
ayahs.translation: [It will be] a Day when no human being shall be of the least avail to another human being: for on that Day [it will become manifest that] all sovereignty is God's alone.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
ayahs.translation: WOE UNTO THOSE who give short measure:

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
ayahs.translation: those who, when they are to receive their due from [other] people, demand that it be given in full –

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: but when they have to measure or weigh whatever they owe to others, give less than what is due!

ayahs.text: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
ayahs.translation: Do they not know that they are bound to be raised from the dead

ayahs.text: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
ayahs.translation: [and called to account] on an awesome Day –

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.translation: the Day when all men shall stand before the Sustainer of all the worlds?

ayahs.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍۢ
ayahs.translation: NAY, VERILY, the record of the wicked is indeed [set down] in a mode inescapable!

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that that mode inescapable will be?

ayahs.text: كِتَٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ
ayahs.translation: A record [indelibly] inscribed!

ayahs.text: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayahs.translation: Woe on that Day unto those who give the lie to the truth –

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: those who give the lie to the [coming of] Judgment Day:

ayahs.text: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
ayahs.translation: for, none gives the lie to it but such as are wont to transgress against all that is [and are] immersed in sin:

ayahs.text: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.translation: [and so,] whenever Our messages are conveyed to them, they but say, "Fables of ancient times!"

ayahs.text: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
ayahs.translation: Nay, but their hearts are corroded by all [the evil] that they were wont to do!

ayahs.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
ayahs.translation: Nay, verily, from [the grace of] their Sustainer shall they on that Day be debarred;

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
ayahs.translation: and then, behold, they shall enter the blazing fire

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayahs.translation: and be told: "This is the [very thing] to which you were wont to give the lie!"

ayahs.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ
ayahs.translation: NAY, VERILY - the record of the truly virtuous is [set down] in a mode most lofty!

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that mode most lofty will be?

ayahs.text: كِتَٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ
ayahs.translation: A record [indelibly] inscribed,

ayahs.text: يَشْهَدُهُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
ayahs.translation: witnessed~ by all who have [ever] been drawn close unto God.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ
ayahs.translation: Behold, [in the life to come] the truly virtuous will indeed be in bliss:

ayahs.text: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
ayahs.translation: [resting on couches, they will look up [to God]:

ayahs.text: تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
ayahs.translation: upon their faces thou wilt see the brightness of bliss.

ayahs.text: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍۢ مَّخْتُومٍ
ayahs.translation: They will be given a drink of pure wine whereon the seal [of God] will have been set,

ayahs.text: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌۭ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
ayahs.translation: pouring forth with a fragrance of musk. To that [wine of paradise], then, let all such aspire as [are willing to] aspire to things of high account:

ayahs.text: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
ayahs.translation: for it is composed of all that is most exalting

ayahs.text: عَيْنًۭا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ
ayahs.translation: a source [of bliss] whereof those who are drawn close unto God shall drink.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ
ayahs.translation: BEHOLD, those who have abandoned themselves to sin are wont to laugh at such as have attained to faith

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
ayahs.translation: and whenever they pass by them, they wink at one another [derisively];

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ
ayahs.translation: and whenever they return to people of their own kind, they return full of jests;

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
ayahs.translation: and whenever they see those [who believe,] they say, "Behold, these [people] have indeed gone astray!"

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أُرْسِلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ حَٰفِظِينَ
ayahs.translation: And, withal, they have no call to watch over [the beliefs of] others...

ayahs.text: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
ayahs.translation: But on the Day [of Judgment], they who had attained to faith will [be able to] laugh at the [erstwhile] deniers of the truth:

ayahs.text: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
ayahs.translation: [for, resting in paradise] on couches, they will look on [and say to themselves]:

ayahs.text: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
ayahs.translation: "Are these deniers of the truth being [thus] requited for [aught but] what they were wont to do?"

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ
ayahs.translation: WHEN THE SKY is split asunder,

ayahs.text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
ayahs.translation: obeying its Sustainer, as in truth it must;

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا ٱلْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
ayahs.translation: and when the earth is leveled,

ayahs.text: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
ayahs.translation: and casts forth whatever is in it, and becomes utterly void,

ayahs.text: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
ayahs.translation: obeying its Sustainer, as in truth it must -:

ayahs.text: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًۭا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ
ayahs.translation: [then,] O man - thou [that] hast, verily, been toiling towards thy Sustainer in painful toil - then shalt thou meet Him!

ayahs.text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ
ayahs.translation: And as for him whose record shall be placed in his right hand,

ayahs.text: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًۭا يَسِيرًۭا
ayahs.translation: he will in time be called to account with an easy accounting,

ayahs.text: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًۭا
ayahs.translation: and will [be able to] turn joyfully to those of his own kind.

ayahs.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ
ayahs.translation: But as for him whose record shall be given to him behind his back;

ayahs.text: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًۭا
ayahs.translation: he will in time pray for utter destruction:

ayahs.text: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
ayahs.translation: but he will enter the blazing flame.

ayahs.text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِىٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا
ayahs.translation: Behold, [in his earthly life] he lived joyfully among people of his own kind

ayahs.text: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
ayahs.translation: for, behold, he never thought that he would have to return [to God].

ayahs.text: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًۭا
ayahs.translation: Yea indeed! His Sustainer did see all that was in him!

ayahs.text: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
ayahs.translation: BUT NAY! I call to witness the sunset's [fleeting] afterglow,

ayahs.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
ayahs.translation: and the night, and what it [step by step] unfolds,

ayahs.text: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
ayahs.translation: and the moon, as it grows to its fullness:

ayahs.text: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍۢ
ayahs.translation: [even thus, O men,] are you bound to move; onward from stage to stage.

ayahs.text: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayahs.translation: What, then, is amiss with them that they will not believe [in a life to come]?

ayahs.text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
ayahs.translation: and [that], when the Qur’an is read unto them, they do not fall down in prostration?

ayahs.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُكَذِّبُونَ
ayahs.translation: Nay, but they who are bent on denying the truth give the lie [to this divine writ]!

ayahs.text: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
ayahs.translation: Yet God has full knowledge of what they conceal [in their hearts].

ayahs.text: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
ayahs.translation: Hence, give them the tiding of grievous suffering [in the life to come] –

ayahs.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ
ayahs.translation: unless it be such [of them] as [repent, and] attain to faith, and do good works: for theirs shall be a reward unending!.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ
ayahs.translation: CONSIDER the sky full of great constellations,

ayahs.text: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ
ayahs.translation: and [then bethink thyself of] the promised Day,

ayahs.text: وَشَاهِدٍۢ وَمَشْهُودٍۢ
ayahs.translation: and [of] Him who witnesses [all], and [of] that unto which witness is borne [by Him]!

ayahs.text: قُتِلَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْأُخْدُودِ
ayahs.translation: THEY DESTROY [but] themselves, they who would ready a pit

ayahs.text: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلْوَقُودِ
ayahs.translation: of fire fiercely burning [for all who have attained to faith]!

ayahs.text: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Lo! [With glee do] they contemplate that [fire],

ayahs.text: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌۭ
ayahs.translation: fully conscious of what they are doing to the believers,

ayahs.text: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
ayahs.translation: whom they hate for no other reason than that they believe in God, the Almighty, the One to whom all praise is due,

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ
ayahs.translation: [and] to whom the dominion of the heavens and the earth belongs. But God is witness unto everything!

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
ayahs.translation: Verily, as for those who persecute believing men and believing women, and thereafter do not repent, hell's suffering awaits them: yea, suffering through fire awaits them!

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
ayahs.translation: [But,] verily, they who attain to faith and do righteous deeds shall [in the life to come] have gardens through which running waters flow - that triumph most great!

ayahs.text: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
ayahs.translation: VERILY, thy Sustainer's grip is exceedingly strong!

ayahs.text: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
ayahs.translation: Behold, it is He who creates [man] in the first instance, and He [it is who] will bring him forth anew.

ayahs.text: وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلْوَدُودُ
ayahs.translation: And He alone is truly-forgiving, all-embracing in His love,

ayahs.text: ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْمَجِيدُ
ayahs.translation: in sublime almightiness enthroned,

ayahs.text: فَعَّالٌۭ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
ayahs.translation: a sovereign doer of whatever He wills.

ayahs.text: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ
ayahs.translation: HAS IT ever come within thy ken, the story of the [sinful] hosts

ayahs.text: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
ayahs.translation: of Pharaoh, and of [the tribe of] Thamud?

ayahs.text: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى تَكْذِيبٍۢ
ayahs.translation: And yet, they who are bent on denying the truth persist in giving it the lie:

ayahs.text: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطٌۢ
ayahs.translation: but all the while God encompasses them [with His knowledge and might] without their being aware of it.

ayahs.text: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَانٌۭ مَّجِيدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Nay, but this [divine writ which they reject] is a discourse sublime,

ayahs.text: فِى لَوْحٍۢ مَّحْفُوظٍۭ
ayahs.translation: upon an imperishable tablet [inscribed].

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
ayahs.translation: CONSIDER the heavens and that which comes in the night!

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what it is that comes in the night?

ayahs.text: ٱلنَّجْمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
ayahs.translation: It is the star that pierces through [life's] darkness:

ayahs.text: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌۭ
ayahs.translation: [for] no human being has ever been left unguarded.

ayahs.text: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
ayahs.translation: LET MAN, then, observe out of what he has been created:

ayahs.text: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٍۢ دَافِقٍۢ
ayahs.translation: he has been created out of a seminal fluid

ayahs.text: يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ ٱلصُّلْبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ
ayahs.translation: issuing from between the loins [of man] and the pelvic arch [of woman].

ayahs.text: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Now, verily, He [who thus creates man in the first instance] is well able to bring him back [to life]

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ
ayahs.translation: on the Day when all secrets will be laid bare,

ayahs.text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍۢ وَلَا نَاصِرٍۢ
ayahs.translation: and [man] will have neither strength nor helper!

ayahs.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجْعِ
ayahs.translation: Consider the heavens, ever-revolving,

ayahs.text: وَٱلْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدْعِ
ayahs.translation: and the earth, bursting forth with plants!

ayahs.text: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلٌۭ فَصْلٌۭ
ayahs.translation: BEHOLD, this [divine writ] is indeed a word that between truth and falsehood,

ayahs.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلْهَزْلِ
ayahs.translation: and is no idle tale.

ayahs.text: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًۭا
ayahs.translation: Behold, they [who refuse to accept it] devise many a false argument [to disprove its truth];

ayahs.text: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًۭا
ayahs.translation: but I shall bring all their scheming to nought.

ayahs.text: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًۢا
ayahs.translation: Let, then, the deniers of the truth have their will: let them have their will for a little while.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى
ayahs.translation: EXTOL the limitless glory of thy Sustainer's name: [the glory of] the Al-Highest,

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: who creates [every thing], and thereupon forms it in accordance with what it is meant to be,

ayahs.text: وَٱلَّذِى قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and who determines the nature [of all that exists], and thereupon guides it [towards its fulfilment],

ayahs.text: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and who brings forth herbage,

ayahs.text: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحْوَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and thereupon causes it to decay into rust-brown stubble!

ayahs.text: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: WE SHALL teach thee, and thou wilt not forget [aught of what thou art taught],

ayahs.text: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
ayahs.translation: save what God may will [thee to forget] - for, verily, He [alone] knows all that is open to [man's] perception as well as all that is hidden [from it]

ayahs.text: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and [thus] shall We make easy for thee the path towards [ultimate] ease.

ayahs.text: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: REMIND, THEN, [others of the truth, regardless of] whether this reminding [would seem to] be of use [or not]:

ayahs.text: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
ayahs.translation: in mind will keep it he who stands in awe [of God],

ayahs.text: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَشْقَى
ayahs.translation: but aloof from it will remain that most hapless wretch –

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: he who [in the life to come] shall have to endure the great fire

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
ayahs.translation: wherein he will neither die nor remain alive.

ayahs.text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: To happiness [in the life to come] will indeed attain he who attains to purity [in this world],

ayahs.text: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: and remembers his Sustainer's name, and prays [unto Him].

ayahs.text: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
ayahs.translation: But nay, [O men,] you prefer the life of this world,

ayahs.text: وَٱلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: although the life to come is better and more enduring.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
ayahs.translation: Verily, [all] this has indeed been [said] in the earlier revelations –

ayahs.text: صُحُفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
ayahs.translation: the revelations of Abraham and Moses.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَٰشِيَةِ
ayahs.translation: HAS THERE COME unto thee the tiding of the Overshadowing Event?'

ayahs.text: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ
ayahs.translation: Some faces will on that Day be downcast,

ayahs.text: عَامِلَةٌۭ نَّاصِبَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: toiling [under burdens of sin], worn out [by fear],

ayahs.text: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةًۭ
ayahs.translation: about to enter a glowing fire,

ayahs.text: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ ءَانِيَةٍۢ
ayahs.translation: given to drink from a boiling spring.

ayahs.text: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍۢ
ayahs.translation: No food for them save the bitterness of dry thorns,

ayahs.text: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍۢ
ayahs.translation: which gives no strength and neither stills hunger.

ayahs.text: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ نَّاعِمَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: [And] some faces will on that Day shine with bliss,

ayahs.text: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: well-pleased with [the fruit of] their striving,

ayahs.text: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍۢ
ayahs.translation: in a garden sublime,

ayahs.text: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةًۭ
ayahs.translation: wherein thou wilt hear no empty talk.

ayahs.text: فِيهَا عَيْنٌۭ جَارِيَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Countless springs will flow therein,

ayahs.text: فِيهَا سُرُرٌۭ مَّرْفُوعَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: [and] there will be thrones [of happiness] raised high,

ayahs.text: وَأَكْوَابٌۭ مَّوْضُوعَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: and goblets placed ready,

ayahs.text: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: and cushions ranged,

ayahs.text: وَزَرَابِىُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
ayahs.translation: and carpets spread out…

ayahs.text: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
ayahs.translation: DO, THEN, they [who deny resurrection] never gaze at the clouds pregnant with water, [and observe] how they are created?

ayahs.text: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
ayahs.translation: And at the sky, how it is raised aloft?

ayahs.text: وَإِلَى ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
ayahs.translation: And at the mountains, how firmly they are reared?

ayahs.text: وَإِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
ayahs.translation: And at the earth, how it is spread out?

ayahs.text: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌۭ
ayahs.translation: And so, [O Prophet,] exhort them; thy task is only to exhort:

ayahs.text: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
ayahs.translation: thou canst not compel them [to believe].

ayahs.text: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
ayahs.translation: However, as for him who turns away, being bent on denying the truth,

ayahs.text: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَكْبَرَ
ayahs.translation: him will God cause to suffer the greatest suffering [in the life to come]:

ayahs.text: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَآ إِيَابَهُمْ
ayahs.translation: for behold, unto Us will be their return,

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
ayahs.translation: and verily, It is for Us to call them to account.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلْفَجْرِ
ayahs.translation: CONSIDER the daybreak

ayahs.text: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍۢ
ayahs.translation: and the ten nights!

ayahs.text: وَٱلشَّفْعِ وَٱلْوَتْرِ
ayahs.translation: Consider the multiple and the One!

ayahs.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
ayahs.translation: Consider the night as it runs its course!

ayahs.text: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌۭ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ
ayahs.translation: Considering all this - could there be, to anyone endowed with reason, a [more] solemn evidence of the truth?

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
ayahs.translation: ART THOU NOT aware of how thy Sustainer has dealt with [the tribe of] ‘Ad,

ayahs.text: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ
ayahs.translation: [the people of] Iram the many-pillared,

ayahs.text: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
ayahs.translation: the like of whom has never been reared in all the land? –

ayahs.text: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ
ayahs.translation: and with [the tribe of] Thamud, who hollowed out rocks in the valley? –

ayahs.text: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
ayahs.translation: and with Pharaoh of the [many] tent-poles?

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ
ayahs.translation: [It was they] who transgressed all bounds of equity all over their lands,

ayahs.text: فَأَكْثَرُوا۟ فِيهَا ٱلْفَسَادَ
ayahs.translation: and brought about great corruption therein:

ayahs.text: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
ayahs.translation: and therefore thy Sustainer let loose upon them a scourge of suffering:

ayahs.text: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلْمِرْصَادِ
ayahs.translation: for, verily, thy Sustainer is ever on the watch!

ayahs.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ
ayahs.translation: BUT AS FOR man, whenever his Sustainer tries him by His generosity and by letting him enjoy a life of ease, he says, "My Sustainer has been [justly] generous towards me";

ayahs.text: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَٰنَنِ
ayahs.translation: whereas, whenever He tries him by straitening his means of livelihood, he says, "My Sustainer has disgraced me!"

ayahs.text: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
ayahs.translation: But nay, nay, [O men, consider all that you do and fail to do:] you are not generous towards the orphan,

ayahs.text: وَلَا تَحَٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
ayahs.translation: and you do not urge one another to feed the needy,

ayahs.text: وَتَأْكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكْلًۭا لَّمًّۭا
ayahs.translation: and you devour the inheritance [of others] with devouring greed,

ayahs.text: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلْمَالَ حُبًّۭا جَمًّۭا
ayahs.translation: and you love wealth with boundless love!

ayahs.text: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّۭا دَكًّۭا
ayahs.translation: Nay, but [how will you fare on Judgment Day,] when the earth is crushed with crushing upon crushing,

ayahs.text: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلْمَلَكُ صَفًّۭا صَفًّۭا
ayahs.translation: and [the majesty of] thy Sustainer stands revealed, as well as [the true nature of] the angels; rank upon rank?

ayahs.text: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: And on that Day hell will be brought [within sight]; on that Day man will remember [all that he did and failed to do]: but what will that remembrance avail him?

ayahs.text: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِى
ayahs.translation: He will say, "Oh, would that I had. provided beforehand for my life [to come]!"

ayahs.text: فَيَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: For, none can make suffer as He will make suffer [the sinners] on that Day,

ayahs.text: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: and none can bind with bonds like His.

ayahs.text: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
ayahs.translation: [But unto the righteous God will say,] "O thou human being that hast attained to inner peace!

ayahs.text: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةًۭ مَّرْضِيَّةًۭ
ayahs.translation: Return thou unto thy Sustainer, well-pleased [and] pleasing [Him]:

ayahs.text: فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَٰدِى
ayahs.translation: enter, then, together with My [other true] servants –

ayahs.text: وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى
ayahs.translation: yea, enter thou My paradise!"

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
ayahs.translation: NAY! I call to witness this land –

ayahs.text: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ
ayahs.translation: this land in which thou art free to dwell -

ayahs.text: وَوَالِدٍۢ وَمَا وَلَدَ
ayahs.translation: and [I call to witness] parent and offspring:

ayahs.text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِى كَبَدٍ
ayahs.translation: Verily, We have created man into [a life of] pain, toil and trial.

ayahs.text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: Does he, then, think that no one has power over him?

ayahs.text: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًۭا لُّبَدًا
ayahs.translation: He boasts, "I have spent wealth abundant!"

ayahs.text: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ
ayahs.translation: Does he, then, think that no one sees him?

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عَيْنَيْنِ
ayahs.translation: Have We not given him two eyes,

ayahs.text: وَلِسَانًۭا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
ayahs.translation: and a tongue, and a pair of lips,

ayahs.text: وَهَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجْدَيْنِ
ayahs.translation: and shown him the two highways [of good and evil]?

ayahs.text: فَلَا ٱقْتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ
ayahs.translation: But he would not try to ascend the steep uphill road...

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what it is, that steep uphill road?

ayahs.text: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
ayahs.translation: [It is] the freeing of one's neck [from the burden of sin],

ayahs.text: أَوْ إِطْعَٰمٌۭ فِى يَوْمٍۢ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍۢ
ayahs.translation: or the feeding, upon a day of [one's own] hunger,

ayahs.text: يَتِيمًۭا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
ayahs.translation: of an orphan near of kin,

ayahs.text: أَوْ مِسْكِينًۭا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍۢ
ayahs.translation: or of a needy [stranger] lying in the dust –

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
ayahs.translation: and being, withal, of those who have attained to faith, and who enjoin upon one another patience in adversity, and enjoin upon one another compassion.

ayahs.text: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ
ayahs.translation: Such are they that have attained to righteousness;

ayahs.text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
ayahs.translation: whereas those who are bent on denying the truth of Our messages – they are such as have lost themselves in evil,

ayahs.text: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌۭ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۢ
ayahs.translation: [with] fire closing in upon them.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: CONSIDER the sun and its radiant brightness,

ayahs.text: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: and the moon as it reflects the sun!

ayahs.text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: Consider the day as it reveals the world,

ayahs.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: and the night as it veils it darkly!

ayahs.text: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: Consider the sky and its wondrous make,

ayahs.text: وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: and the earth and all its expanse!

ayahs.text: وَنَفْسٍۢ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: Consider the human self, and how it is formed in accordance with what it is meant to be,

ayahs.text: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: and how it is imbued with moral failings as well as with consciousness of God!

ayahs.text: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: To a happy state shall indeed attain he who causes this [self] to grow in purity,

ayahs.text: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: and truly lost is he who buries it [in darkness].

ayahs.text: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ
ayahs.translation: TO [THIS] TRUTH gave the lie, in their overweening arrogance, [the tribe of] Thamud,

ayahs.text: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشْقَىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: when that most hapless wretch from among them rushed forward [to commit his evil deed],

ayahs.text: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَٰهَا
ayahs.translation: although God's apostle had told them, "It is a she-camel belonging to God, so let her drink [and do her no harm]!"

ayahs.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
ayahs.translation: But they gave him the lie, and cruelly slaughtered her - whereupon their Sustainer visited them with utter destruction for this their sin, destroying them all alike:

ayahs.text: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَٰهَا
ayahs.translation: for none [of them] had any fear of what might befall them.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
ayahs.translation: CONSIDER the night as it veils [the earth] in darkness,

ayahs.text: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: and the day as it rises bright!

ayahs.text: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: Consider the creation of the male and the female!

ayahs.text: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: Verily, [O men,] you aim at most divergent ends!

ayahs.text: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
ayahs.translation: Thus, as for him who gives [to others] and is conscious of God,

ayahs.text: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and believes in the truth of the ultimate good

ayahs.text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: for him shall We make easy the path towards [ultimate] ease.

ayahs.text: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ
ayahs.translation: But as for him who is niggardly, and thinks that he is self-sufficient,

ayahs.text: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and calls the ultimate good a lie –

ayahs.text: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: for him shall We make easy the path towards hardship:

ayahs.text: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: and what will his wealth avail him when he goes down [to his grave]?

ayahs.text: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
ayahs.translation: BEHOLD, it is indeed for Us to grace [you] with guidance;

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْءَاخِرَةَ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and, behold, Ours is [the dominion over] the life to come as well as [over] this earlier part [of your life]:

ayahs.text: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًۭا تَلَظَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: and so I warn you of the raging fire -

ayahs.text: لَا يَصْلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْأَشْقَى
ayahs.translation: [the fire] which none shall have to endure but that most hapless wretch

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: who gives the lie to the truth and turns away [from it].

ayahs.text: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَتْقَى
