ayahs.translation: For, distant from it shall remain he who is truly conscious of God:

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى يُؤْتِى مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
ayahs.translation: he that spends his possessions [on others] so that he might grow in purity –

ayahs.text: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍۢ تُجْزَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: not as payment for favours received,

ayahs.text: إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ
ayahs.translation: but only out of a longing for the countenance of his Sustainer, the All-Highest:

ayahs.text: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and such, indeed, shall in time be well-pleased.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
ayahs.translation: CONSIDER the bright morning hours,

ayahs.text: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
ayahs.translation: and the night when it grows still and dark.

ayahs.text: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
ayahs.translation: Thy Sustainer has not forsaken thee, nor does He scorn thee:

ayahs.text: وَلَلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ
ayahs.translation: for, indeed, the life to come will be better for thee than this earlier part [of thy life]!

ayahs.text: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: And, indeed, in time will thy Sustainer grant thee [what thy heart desires], and thou shalt be well-pleased.

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًۭا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
ayahs.translation: Has He not found thee an orphan, and given thee shelter?

ayahs.text: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلًّۭا فَهَدَىٰ
ayahs.translation: And found thee lost on thy way, and guided thee?

ayahs.text: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلًۭا فَأَغْنَىٰ
ayahs.translation: And found thee in want, and given thee sufficiency?

ayahs.text: فَأَمَّا ٱلْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
ayahs.translation: Therefore, the orphan shalt thou never wrong,

ayahs.text: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
ayahs.translation: and him that seeks [thy] help shalt thou never chide,

ayahs.text: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
ayahs.translation: and of thy Sustainer's blessings shalt thou [ever] speak.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
ayahs.translation: HAVE WE NOT opened up thy heart,

ayahs.text: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
ayahs.translation: and lifted from thee the burden

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
ayahs.translation: that had weighed so heavily on thy back?

ayahs.text: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
ayahs.translation: And [have We not] raised thee high in dignity?

ayahs.text: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
ayahs.translation: And, behold, with every hardship comes ease:

ayahs.text: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًۭا
ayahs.translation: verily, with every hardship comes ease!

ayahs.text: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَٱنصَبْ
ayahs.translation: Hence, when thou art freed [from distress], remain steadfast,

ayahs.text: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرْغَب
ayahs.translation: and unto thy Sustainer turn with love.

ayahs.text: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ
ayahs.translation: CONSIDER the fig and the olive,

ayahs.text: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
ayahs.translation: and Mount Sinai,

ayahs.text: وَهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ ٱلْأَمِينِ
ayahs.translation: and this land secure!

ayahs.text: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Verily, We create man in the best conformation;

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ
ayahs.translation: and thereafter We reduce him to the lowest of low

ayahs.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۢ
ayahs.translation: excepting only such as attain to faith and do good works: and theirs shall be a reward unending!

ayahs.text: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِٱلدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: What, then, [O man,] could henceforth cause thee to give the lie to this moral law?

ayahs.text: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ ٱلْحَٰكِمِينَ
ayahs.translation: Is not God the most just of judges?

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ
ayahs.translation: READ in the name of thy Sustainer, who has-

ayahs.text: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
ayahs.translation: created man out of a germ-cell

ayahs.text: ٱقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْأَكْرَمُ
ayahs.translation: Read - for thy Sustainer is the Most Bountiful One

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِٱلْقَلَمِ
ayahs.translation: who has taught [man] the use of the pen –

ayahs.text: عَلَّمَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
ayahs.translation: taught man what he did not know!

ayahs.text: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطْغَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: Nay, verily, man becomes grossly overweening

ayahs.text: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: whenever he believes himself to be self-sufficient:

ayahs.text: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجْعَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: for, behold, unto thy Sustainer all must return.

ayahs.text: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ
ayahs.translation: HAST THOU ever considered him who tries to prevent

ayahs.text: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: a servant [of God] from praying?

ayahs.text: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: Hast thou considered whether he is on the right way,

ayahs.text: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقْوَىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: or is concerned with God-consciousness?

ayahs.text: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ
ayahs.translation: Hast thou considered whether he may [not] be giving the lie to the truth and turning his back [upon it]?

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
ayahs.translation: Does he, then, not know that God sees [all]?

ayahs.text: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
ayahs.translation: Nay, if he desist not, We shall most surely drag him down upon his forehead

ayahs.text: نَاصِيَةٍۢ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍۢ
ayahs.translation: the lying, rebellious forehead! –

ayahs.text: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: and then let him summon [to his aid] the counsels of his own [spurious] wisdom,

ayahs.text: سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ
ayahs.translation: [the while] We shall summon the forces of heavenly chastisement!

ayahs.text: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَٱسْجُدْ وَٱقْتَرِب ۩
ayahs.translation: Nay, pay thou no heed to him, but prostrate thyself [before God] and draw close [unto Him]!

ayahs.text: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
ayahs.translation: BEHOLD, from on high have We bestowed this [divine writ] on Night of Destiny.

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what it is, that Night of Destiny?

ayahs.text: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍۢ
ayahs.translation: The Night of Destiny is better than a thousand months:

ayahs.text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍۢ
ayahs.translation: in hosts descend in it the angels, bearing divine inspiration by their Sustainer's leave; from all [evil] that may happen

ayahs.text: سَلَٰمٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ ٱلْفَجْرِ
ayahs.translation: does it make secure, until the rise of dawn.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
ayahs.translation: IT IS NOT [conceivable] that such as are bent on denying the truth - [be they] from among the followers of earlier revelation or from among those who ascribe divinity to aught beside God should ever be abandoned [by Him] ere there comes unto them the [full] evidence of the truth:

ayahs.text: رَسُولٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًۭا مُّطَهَّرَةًۭ
ayahs.translation: an apostle from God, conveying [unto them] revelations blest with purity,

ayahs.text: فِيهَا كُتُبٌۭ قَيِّمَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: wherein there are ordinances of ever-true soundness and clarity.

ayahs.text: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ
ayahs.translation: Now those who have been vouchsafed revelation aforetime did break up their unity [of faith] after such an evidence of the truth had come to them.

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ
ayahs.translation: And withal, they were not enjoined aught but that they should worship God, sincere in their faith in Him alone, turning away from all that is false; and that they should be constant in prayer; and that they should spend in charity: for this is a moral law endowed with ever-true soundness and clarity.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
ayahs.translation: Verily, those who [despite all evidence] are bent on denying the truth - [be they] from among the followers of earlier revelation or from among those who ascribe divinity to aught beside God - will find themselves in the fire of hell, therein to abide: they are the worst of all creatures.

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ
ayahs.translation: [And,] verily, those who have attained to faith, and do righteous deeds - it is they, they who are the best of all creatures.

ayahs.text: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّٰتُ عَدْنٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ
ayahs.translation: Their reward [awaits them] with God: gardens of perpetual bliss, through which running waters flow, therein to abide beyond the count of time; well-pleased is God with them, and well-pleased are they with Him: all this awaits him who of his Sustainer stands in awe!.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
ayahs.translation: WHEN THE EARTH quakes with her [last] mighty quaking,

ayahs.text: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
ayahs.translation: and [when] the earth yields up her burdens,

ayahs.text: وَقَالَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا
ayahs.translation: and man cries out, "What has happened to her?" -

ayahs.text: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
ayahs.translation: on that Day will she recount all her tidings,

ayahs.text: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
ayahs.translation: as thy Sustainer will have inspired her to do!

ayahs.text: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًۭا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ
ayahs.translation: On that Day will all men come forward, cut off from one another, to be shown their [past] deeds.

ayahs.text: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًۭا يَرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: And so, he who shall have done an atom's weight of good, shall behold it;

ayahs.text: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍۢ شَرًّۭا يَرَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: and he who shall have done an atom's weight of evil, shall behold it.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلْعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبْحًۭا
ayahs.translation: Oh, the chargers that run panting,

ayahs.text: فَٱلْمُورِيَٰتِ قَدْحًۭا
ayahs.translation: sparks of fire striking,

ayahs.text: فَٱلْمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبْحًۭا
ayahs.translation: rushing to assault at morn,

ayahs.text: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِۦ نَقْعًۭا
ayahs.translation: thereby raising clouds of dust,

ayahs.text: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ جَمْعًا
ayahs.translation: thereby storming [blindly] into any host!

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٌۭ
ayahs.translation: VERILY, towards his Sustainer man is most ungrateful

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌۭ
ayahs.translation: and to this, behold, he [himself] bears witness indeed:

ayahs.text: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
ayahs.translation: for, verily, to the love of wealth is he most ardently devoted.

ayahs.text: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
ayahs.translation: But does he not know that [on the Last Day,] when all that is in the graves is raised and brought out,

ayahs.text: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayahs.translation: and all that is [hidden] in men's hearts is bared

ayahs.text: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّخَبِيرٌۢ
ayahs.translation: that on that Day their Sustainer [will show that He] has always been fully aware of them?

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
ayahs.translation: OH, the sudden calamity!

ayahs.text: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
ayahs.translation: How awesome the sudden calamity!

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that sudden calamity will be?

ayahs.text: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلْفَرَاشِ ٱلْمَبْثُوثِ
ayahs.translation: [It will occur] on the Day when men will be like moths swarming in confusion,

ayahs.text: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ
ayahs.translation: and the mountains will be like fluffy tufts of wool....

ayahs.text: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
ayahs.translation: And then, he whose weight [of good deeds] is heavy in the balance

ayahs.text: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍۢ رَّاضِيَةٍۢ
ayahs.translation: shall find himself in a happy' state of life;

ayahs.text: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ
ayahs.translation: whereas he whose weight is light in the balance

ayahs.text: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: shall be engulfed by an abyss.

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهْ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that [abyss] will be?

ayahs.text: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌۢ
ayahs.translation: A fire hotly burning!

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ
ayahs.translation: YOU ARE OBSESSED by greed for more and more

ayahs.text: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ
ayahs.translation: until you go down to your graves.

ayahs.text: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: Nay, in time you will come to understand!

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.translation: And once again: Nay, in time you will come to understand!

ayahs.text: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
ayahs.translation: Nay, if you could but understand [it] with an understanding [born] of certainty,

ayahs.text: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ
ayahs.translation: you would indeed, most surely, behold the blazing fire [of hell]!

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ ٱلْيَقِينِ
ayahs.translation: In the end you will indeed, most surely, behold it with the eye of certainty:

ayahs.text: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
ayahs.translation: and on that Day you will most surely be called to account for [what you did with] the boon of life!

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلْعَصْرِ
ayahs.translation: CONSIDER the flight of time!

ayahs.text: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ
ayahs.translation: Verily, man is bound to lose himself

ayahs.text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
ayahs.translation: unless he be of those who attain to faith, and do good works, and enjoin upon one another the keeping to truth, and enjoin upon one another patience in adversity.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌۭ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍۢ لُّمَزَةٍ
ayahs.translation: WOE unto every slanderer, fault-finder!

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًۭا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: [Woe unto him who amasses wealth and counts it a safeguard,

ayahs.text: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ
ayahs.translation: thinking that his wealth will make him live forever!

ayahs.text: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِى ٱلْحُطَمَةِ
ayahs.translation: Nay, but [in the life to come such as] he shall indeed be abandoned to crushing torment!

ayahs.text: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحُطَمَةُ
ayahs.translation: And what could make thee conceive what that crushing torment will be?

ayahs.text: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُوقَدَةُ
ayahs.translation: A fire kindled by God,

ayahs.text: ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةِ
ayahs.translation: which will rise over the [guilty] hearts:

ayahs.text: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌۭ
ayahs.translation: verily, it will close in upon them

ayahs.text: فِى عَمَدٍۢ مُّمَدَّدَةٍۭ
ayahs.translation: in endless columns!

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
ayahs.translation: ART THOU NOT aware of how thy Sustainer dealt with the Army of the Elephant?

ayahs.text: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍۢ
ayahs.translation: Did He not utterly confound their artful planning?

ayahs.text: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
ayahs.translation: Thus, He let loose upon them great swarms of flying creatures

ayahs.text: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍۢ مِّن سِجِّيلٍۢ
ayahs.translation: which smote them with stone-hard blows of chastisement pre-ordained,

ayahs.text: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍۢ مَّأْكُولٍۭ
ayahs.translation: and caused them to become like a field of grain that has been eaten down to stubble

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ
ayahs.translation: SO THAT the Quraysh might remain secure,

ayahs.text: إِۦلَٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ
ayahs.translation: secure in their winter and summer journeys,

ayahs.text: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلْبَيْتِ
ayahs.translation: Let them, therefore, worship the Sustainer of this Temple;

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍۢ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
ayahs.translation: who has given them food against hunger, and made them safe from danger.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ
ayahs.translation: HAST THOU ever considered [the kind of man] who gives the lie to all moral law?

ayahs.text: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ
ayahs.translation: Behold, it is this [kind of man] that thrusts the orphan away,

ayahs.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ
ayahs.translation: and feels no urge to feed the needy.

ayahs.text: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
ayahs.translation: Woe, then, unto those praying ones

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
ayahs.translation: whose hearts from their prayer are remote

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَآءُونَ
ayahs.translation: those who want only to be seen and praised,

ayahs.text: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ
ayahs.translation: and, withal, deny all assistance [to their fellow-men]!

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ
ayahs.translation: BEHOLD, We have bestowed upon thee good in abundance:

ayahs.text: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ
ayahs.translation: hence, pray unto thy Sustainer [alone], and sacrifice [unto Him alone].

ayahs.text: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ
ayahs.translation: Verily, he that hates thee has indeed been cut off [from all that is good]!

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ
ayahs.translation: SAY: "O you who deny the truth!

ayahs.text: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
ayahs.translation: "I do not worship that which you worship,

ayahs.text: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
ayahs.translation: and neither do you worship that which I worship!

ayahs.text: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٌۭ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
ayahs.translation: "And I will not worship ~hat which you have [ever] worshipped,

ayahs.text: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ
ayahs.translation: and neither will you [ever] worship that which I worship.

ayahs.text: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ دِينِ
ayahs.translation: Unto you, your moral law, and unto me, mine!"

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ
ayahs.translation: WHEN GOD'S SUCCOUR comes, and victory,

ayahs.text: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًۭا
ayahs.translation: and thou seest people enter God's religion in hosts,

ayahs.text: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
ayahs.translation: extol thy Sustainer's limitless glory, and praise Him, and seek His forgiveness: for, behold, He is ever an acceptor of repentance.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍۢ وَتَبَّ
ayahs.translation: DOOMED are the hands of him of the glowing countence: and doomed is he!

ayahs.text: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ
ayahs.translation: What will his wealth avail him, and all that he has gained?

ayahs.text: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًۭا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍۢ
ayahs.translation: [In the life to come] he shall have to endure a fire fiercely glowing;

ayahs.text: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلْحَطَبِ
ayahs.translation: together with his wife, that carrier of evil tales,

ayahs.text: فِى جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌۭ مِّن مَّسَدٍۭ
ayahs.translation: [who bears] around her neck a rope of twisted strands!

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
ayahs.translation: SAY: "He is the One God:

ayahs.text: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ
ayahs.translation: "God the Eternal, the Uncaused Cause of All Being.

ayahs.text: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
ayahs.translation: "He begets not, and neither is He begotten;

ayahs.text: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ
ayahs.translation: "and there is nothing that could be compared with Him.

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ
ayahs.translation: SAY: "I seek refuge with the Sustainer of the rising dawn,

ayahs.text: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
ayahs.translation: "from the evil of aught that He has created,

ayahs.text: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
ayahs.translation: "and from the evil of the black darkness whenever it descends,

ayahs.text: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ
ayahs.translation: "and from the evil of all human beings bent on occult endeavours,

ayahs.text: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
ayahs.translation: "and from the evil of the envious when he envies."

ayahs.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ
ayahs.translation: SAY: "I seek refuge with the Sustainer of men,

ayahs.text: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ
ayahs.translation: "the Sovereign of men,

ayahs.text: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ
ayahs.translation: "the God of men,

ayahs.text: مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ
ayahs.translation: "from the evil of the whispering, elusive tempter

ayahs.text: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ
ayahs.translation: "who whispers in the hearts of men

ayahs.text: مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
ayahs.translation: "from all [temptation to evil by] invisible forces as well as men,"
